title: San Francisco/Union Square-Financial District
name: TIX Bay Area
address: on the corner of Union Square at Powell & Geary
content: A ticket booth run by '''[http://www.theatrebayarea.org/index.jsp Theater Bay Area]''', this booth offers many half-price tickets for local performances if you purchase on the day of the show, and you can sometimes buy full-price tickets in advance here as well.
